page.title: 17HOME_LIFE_PETS
page.content: In Class 3J,we took a survey to show the number and type of pets we had. Here are the results: {Guinea pigs 3 {Dogs 12 {Rabbits 4 {Cats 5 {Fish/tropical fish 9 {Budgies 6 {Gerbils 2 {No pets at all 3 A total of 25 children took part in this survey. One boy was asked to describe his pets.He said,"I have got two dogs,one is called Plato,the other is called Jackson.Both are two years old.One is a cocker spaniel the other is a mongrel.They do not fight.I have also got a canary who is called Icarus.The person who gave him to us,suggested the name."
